metadata.title: CVE-2024-3857 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The JIT created incorrect code for arguments in certain cases. This led topotential use-after-free crashes during garbage collection. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 125, Firefox ESR < 115.10, and Thunderbird< 115.10.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
